title: Navy material handling: the fork truck
brief_description: Compares old and new methods of handling materials, demonstrating the use of two and four-wheel hand trucks. Shows the advantages and versatility of various trucks including the mechanised fork truck.
description: Compares old and new methods of handling materials, demonstrating the use of two and four-wheel hand trucks. Shows the advantages and versatility of various trucks including the mechanised fork truck.
